text: Hi! Has anyone successfully used custom object properties in quotes? I tried replicating the synthax HubSpot uses (copying the synthax from another property from a standard object) but came a bit short in terms of the data format.. (not a developer).
any Ideas on where to store section css, dont want to include the css unless the section  is being used

As of now, there is no option to add CSS directly to the section file. However, you can add a class to your section's `dnd_section class="my-section-class"`

More on that in <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/drag-and-drop-areas/sections#section-classes|HubSpot documentation>

Hey <@U7SL518D6> <@UQWGKUEN7> is this still the only way of styling sections? Or maybe there is something you're working on in the next updates to add the same option to sections as it is possible for modules?
